name: bicycle production | bicycle | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2923/documentation

The data set reflects a bike of 17kg including additionals (e.g. carriers, lights). The frame material is Aluminium. Disposal of bicycle is included.



This data set includes the material use for the manufacturing of an average bicycle and the disposal of a bicycle. Manufacturing of the bike parts is assumed to take place in China. Transport to Europe included.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/309:Manufacture of transport equipment n.e.c./3092:Manufacture of bicycles and invalid carriages

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data cover manufacturing in China and retail in Europe.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Manufacturing plant is extrapolated from passenger car plant, electricity consumption extrapolated according to weight ratio from passenger car (50%)
